name: zastro-websockets
description: Use WebSockets in your Astro SSR Apps - Monorepo containing Node.js and Cloudflare adapters
author: Zach Handley

scripts.setup:adapters: cd astro-upstream && git fetch && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.build: pnpm run build:upstream && pnpm run build:adapters
scripts.build:upstream: cd astro-upstream && pnpm install && pnpm run build --filter="!@astrojs/node"
scripts.test:node: pnpm run build && cd ./tests/projects/node && pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ../../..
scripts.test:cloudflare: pnpm run build && cd ./tests/projects/cloudflare && pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ../../..
scripts.test: pnpm run build && pnpm run test:node && pnpm run test:cloudflare
scripts.setup:node: cd astro-upstream && git fetch && git checkout $(git tag --list '@astrojs/node@*' | sort -V | tail -1)
scripts.setup:cloudflare: cd astro-upstream && git fetch && git checkout $(git tag --list '@astrojs/cloudflare@*' | sort -V | tail -1)
